bio: A passionate software developer with a focus on full-stack development, cybersecurity, and machine learning. I enjoy solving complex problems and creating innovative solutions. My skills span from application development to securing systems and leveraging data science.

certifications.title: Certified Secure Software Lifecycle Professional (CSSLP)
certifications.description: Validates expertise in secure software development practices.

certifications.title: Google Professional Machine Learning Engineer
certifications.description: Demonstrates proficiency in designing and building ML solutions on GCP.

certifications.title: CompTIA Security+
certifications.description: Certifies foundational knowledge in core security principles and skills.

goals: My short-term goal is to contribute to a major open-source project. My long-term goal is to lead a team of talented developers and build innovative products.
